reviews.text:
You can enjoy a great variaty of traditional German food, which goes really well beer. If you want to experience the traditional Hamburg beer scene, then you should come here. It's loved by local people. It's reasonable and quite tasty.
The staff was friendly, hospitable and nice. The place is huge! A really good place for friends gathering!
No good access for wheelchairs.
Great value beer, amazing atmosphere. Great for large groups. Service was lovely. Food is mostly non vegetarian or vegan and a bit pricey. Would definitely recommend!

Great restaurant, though could be difficult to see where you go in from the door. Its got really great character and was conveniently 100m from our hotel (Premier Inn). The food choice was traditional German, exactly what we wanted and you could either choose from the buffet where you were served from displayed meats and vegetable options or from a set menu selection. The beer was great and the ambience was fantastic, dimly lit with candles but kind of magical. The service was excellent and catered for English, though predominantly a german restuarant. From couples to large groups they catered for all in a traditional setting. Would go again!!

Pricing is reasonable, they have their own brewery and taste incredible!

It's a place that you can sit down and enjoy without being too busy. You can grab a pint with your mate and enjoy the environment.

Service is fast and friendly, they even accept card!

We had a nice experience there. The food was good, the pork knuckle was not dry, and even though our German is poor, all of them communicated with us in English with no problem. Staff very nice towards us, even if the house was very full. Please do reserve a seat. This place is highly recommended!
